channel.description: File Systems and Swap Review Questions Q. What type of information does the blkid command display? A. Attributes for block devices. Q. What would the command xfs_admin -L bootfs /dev/sda1 do? A. Apply the specified label to the XFS file system in /dev/sda1. Q. The lsblk command cannot be used to view file system UUIDs. True or False? A. False. Q. Which two file systems are created in a default RHEL 9 installation? A. / and /boot.
